article_title: Roderick Bates, Emmett Jones sentenced to life in prison for 2011 Chattanooga murder (with video)

article_metadata.description: A jury has found two Chattanooga men guilty of first-degree murder in the Oct. 7, 2011 shooting death of Reginald Clark, 37.
